response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the saucepot with the carrot onto the stove. Now, we need to cook the carrot which is the final subtask.
response.subtask:
(1) Grasp the saucepot
(2) Grasp the carrot
(3) Put the carrot into the saucepot
(4) Put the saucepot with the carrot onto the stove
(5) Cook the carrot
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 5: Cook the carrot
    carrot = registry(env,"carrot_151")
    cook(robot, carrot)
    donothing(env)
